metadata.title: CVE-2021-3847 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An unauthorized access to the execution of the setuid file withcapabilities flaw in the Linux kernel OverlayFS subsystem was found in theway user copying a capable file from a nosuid mount into another mount. Alocal user could use this flaw to escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'overlayfs is working as intended').
linux-hwe-5.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
